about_the_game:
TechQUEST is an immersive 3D educational game that combines fun and learning to deepen the understanding of key topics from the "Living in the IT Era" course at National University - Manila. Designed with interactive challenges and mini-games, TechQUEST takes players on an exciting journey through modern technology concepts, including the digital divide, ethical implications of technology, and business intelligence.

In TechQUEST, players face engaging, real-world scenarios that help them apply and reinforce what they’ve learned in class. Each mini-game is crafted to explore complex IT topics in an intuitive, enjoyable way. Whether you’re new to IT or looking to enhance your knowledge, TechQUEST provides a unique, interactive experience that brings the digital age to life.
detailed_description:
TechQUEST is an immersive 3D educational game that combines fun and learning to deepen the understanding of key topics from the "Living in the IT Era" course at National University - Manila. Designed with interactive challenges and mini-games, TechQUEST takes players on an exciting journey through modern technology concepts, including the digital divide, ethical implications of technology, and business intelligence.

In TechQUEST, players face engaging, real-world scenarios that help them apply and reinforce what they’ve learned in class. Each mini-game is crafted to explore complex IT topics in an intuitive, enjoyable way. Whether you’re new to IT or looking to enhance your knowledge, TechQUEST provides a unique, interactive experience that brings the digital age to life.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra or newer (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 or equivalent with Metal API support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel Core i7 (3.2 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: TechQUEST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: TechQUEST is a 3D educational game that brings the "Living in the IT Era" course to life. Explore real-world scenarios, tackle interactive mini-games, and deepen your understanding of essential technology concepts. Perfect for students and enthusiasts looking to learn through play!
